user_sentiment: mixed - satisfied with progress but identified new bugs requiring further iteration
execution_quality: Mostly effective implementation with good attention to detail, but follow-up issues indicate some logic gaps in the event handling that weren't caught during initial implementation.
work_category: Feature implementation and bug fixes for app blocking and UI display in a productivity app. Multiple small requirements were addressed in a single focused session.
summary: Agent efficiently implemented four distinct requirements (foreground app tracking, prioritease exemption, color correction for Everything Else, chart filtering) but missed a critical logic issue where blocking could be triggered by non-foreground Kindle events. The follow-up message reveals the implementation didn't fully account for event-driven architecture subtleties and design specification requirements, indicating partial rather than complete alignment with user intent.
follow_up_pattern: User reported regression: blocking screen appearing unexpectedly after dismissal, plus design mismatch requiring review of design documentation and further refinement.
